info.description: REST API Gateway for Shioaji Trading Provider.
info.title: Phoenix API

get.description: List all accounts available for the user

post.description: Activate the Certificate Authority for the user

get.description: Retrieve the expiration time of the user's Certificate Authority

post.description: Authenticate with username and password to get a JWT token

put.description: Modify the price or quantity of an open order

post.description: Submit a buy or sell order to the provider
Submit a multi-leg combo order to the provider
Manually trigger a status update for a combo order
Get detailed profit and loss information

account_id.description: Unique identifier for the trading account.

person_id.description: Unique identifier for the account holder.

signed.description: Whether the account has signed the trading agreement.

username.description: User's name associated with the account.

date.description: Date for which the balance is reported.

errmsg.description: Error message if the fetch failed.

status.description: Success/Failure status of the fetch operation.

action.description: Buy or Sell action for this leg.

legs.description: Individual components of the combo contract.

exchange.description: Exchange where the security is traded.

contract_download.description: Whether to perform a full download.

daytrade_short.description: Whether to allow short day trading.

modified_time.description: When the order was last modified.

position.description:
Types that are valid to be assigned to Position:

	*Position_StockPosition
	*Position_FuturePosition

detail.description:
Types that are valid to be assigned to Detail:

	*PositionDetail_StockDetail
	*PositionDetail_FutureDetail

Types that are valid to be assigned to Detail:

	*ProfitDetail_StockDetail
	*ProfitDetail_FutureDetail

item.description:
Types that are valid to be assigned to Item:

	*ProfitLoss_StockPnl
	*ProfitLoss_FuturePnl

summary.description:
Types that are valid to be assigned to Summary:

	*ProfitLossSummary_StockSummary
	*ProfitLossSummary_FutureSummary

ask_price.description: Best ask at time of tick.

bid_price.description: Best bid at time of tick.

bytes.description: Amount of data consumed in bytes.

limit_bytes.description: Maximum data consumption limit in bytes.

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and then your token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
